title: Trash Sailors Free
description:
Get Trash Sailors for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Trash Sailors is a hand- drawn co-op sailing adventure for one to four players. Create the trashiest team in history in online or local co-op The world was flooded by a giant Trash Tsunami Luckily for you, a lot of trash is floating around. Trash is your main resource and the most valuable thing in this world. You can recycle it into fuel, raft spare parts, and even weapons . Brace yourself for swamp crocodiles, toxic sharks, arctic pirates, and much, much more
